Title: Operation of Markets within Newcastle-under-Lyme Town Centre
Description:
Tender for the Operation of Markets within Newcastle-under-Lyme Town Centre, Newcastle-under-Lyme Borough Council is looking for an experienced market operator for the provision and development of the weekly markets in Newcastle-under-Lyme town centre.
The Council is seeking an innovative operator to manage and develop the town centre market offer in a way that will respond to the positive changes and future potential of the town centre whilst retaining the market at the heart of the local community.
Supplier [Name|Address|Ref type|Ref Numb: [Market Place Management Ltd|The Forum, Fitzroy Street, Ashton-Under-Lyne|NONE||No|No]
